mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER (USER_ID, NAME, EMAIL, USERNAME, PWD, IMAGE, MONEY, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT) VALUES (#{userId}, #{name}, #{email}, #{username}, #{pwd}, #{image}, #{money}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE USER SET MONEY = #{money}, UPDATED_AT = NOW() WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
